message.entry: Expected the following syntax: initialize(H,POINTS, I).
The number of rows in POINTS and the length of VALIDITY must be same.
Changing the class of POINTS is not allowed without first calling the release() method.
Calling step or setPoints is not allowed without first calling the initialize() method.
Re-initializing the object is not allowed without first calling the release() method.
Expected image to be the same size as the image used to initialize the tracker.
Expected image to be the same class as the image used to initialize the tracker.
